task.title: Managing disk I/O optimization
task.shortdesc: The disk I/O priority for a bucket is set via the Data Bucket panel either when creating a data bucket or when editing a data bucket.

context.p: To set disk I/O priority for a bucket:

step.cmd: Navigate to Data Buckets > Create New Bucket (new bucket) or Data Buckets > bucket-info> Edit (existing bucket).
In the Disk I/O Optimization panel, set bucket disk I/O priority option either at High or Low.
step.info: This is an advanced setting that allows you to handle the tasks based on priority. Low is the default.
